title: News | Natural Language Processing Laboratory | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Professor Barbara Di Eugenio recently received the UIC Award for Excellence in Teaching for the 2019-2020 academic year — a prestigious, campus-wide teaching award. See the full post on the College of Engineering’s…
Professor Barbara Di Eugenio was recently named a University Scholar at UIC. Here is a link to her interview with UIC Today: https://today.uic.edu/university-scholar-barbara-di-eugenio

Sabita Acharya successfully defended her PhD thesis, titled: “Generating Personalized Hospital-stay Summaries for Patients” Her committee included: Barbara Di Eugenio (advisor), Andrew Johnson, Debaleena Chattopadhyay, Andrew Boyd, and Richard Cameron
